channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unsecured manhole cover, 18th March
item.description:
Been this way for ages. Makes a loud noise when driven over
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Gauntlet Road, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking, 18th March
item.description:
Coach parked part on doorway on double yellow lines. Past twice a good 16 minutes apart

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Edendale Approach, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrectly synchronised traffic lights, 18th March
item.description:
The left turn signal for leaving the Benhall estate remains red on occasions it could be green. If it made use of these opportunities then it wouldn't need is own sequence therefore improving traffic flow on the A40. This is only occurring since the new lights have been installed with their poorly optimised sequencing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrectly synchronised traffic lights, 18th March
item.description:
The traffic light on the filter lane to Benhall estate is incorrectly set and is going red everyone the main lights turn red. There is absolutely no need for this, unless the pedestrian crossing is being used. This is only happening since the new lights have been activated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing sign, 18th March
item.description:
Street name for Coberley Road is missing, please replace. Empty sign holder looks awful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 25 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
